setEffects.2: Increases the DMG dealt by follow-up attack by {{1, percent}}%.
setEffects.4: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks, increases the wearer's ATK by {{1, percent}}% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack up to {{2}} time(s) and lasts for {{3}} turn(s). This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.
